Initial commit: Complete Cafe Management System

Features implemented:
- Menu Management (with add/edit functionality)
- Orders Management with real-time updates
- Kitchen Display System
- Public QR Code Ordering
- Table Management with QR code generation
- Real-time Socket.io WebSocket updates
- Settings page
- Multi-language support (EN/ID)
- Analytics Dashboard

Tech Stack:
- Backend: NestJS, Prisma, PostgreSQL, Socket.io
- Frontend: Next.js 16, React 19, TypeScript, TailwindCSS
- Authentication: JWT with role-based access control
- Real-time: Socket.io for live order updates
